a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Gross domestic product (GDP) by world region
This data is adjusted for inflation and differences in living costs between countries.

g.text: Sub Saharan Africa (MPD) Sub Saharan Africa (MPD)
Middle East and North Africa (MPD) Middle East and North Africa (MPD)
South and South East Asia (MPD) South and South East Asia (MPD)

text.tspan: Data source: Bolt and van Zanden - Maddison Project Database 2023

Note: This data is expressed in
international-$
at 2011 prices.
